body.name: Vostey Men's Hiking Boots waterproof Casual Chukka Boots for Men
features: Textured upper: selected high-quality materials, exquisite and waterproof, retro fashion color polishing toe processing
Waxing shoelaces: shoelaces are polished with wax treatment, beautiful and generous, comfortable and not tight
Firm stitches: exquisite stitches strengthen the body of the shoe to avoid cracking
Natural rubber outsole: rubber material with rough and bumpy texture, soft and comfortable, wear-non-slip and non-slip

Soft shoe mouth: The skin-friendly soft fabric at the shoe mouth protects your ankles comfortable and shock protection, helping you cope with outdoor, mountain, business, cycling, snow and other scenes

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 Waterproof 2 Excellent quality 3 Sturdy and wear-resistant

Try-on Feedback Casual and Comfortable At first look and feel these boots are impressive.The leather feels good.The laces are some of the best I've seen. I loosened the laces, spread the boot open.Plenty of room in the toe.I felt the support and quality right away. comfy I forget to give them a rest.Honestly, I've had work boots, cowboy boots, hiking and trail boots and I can tell from past experience these boots will last, look good and feel good. And they are Water Proof. What are you waiting for? Buy 'em. Your feet will thank you.

Try-on Feedback Fashionable, Excellent quality Repels melted snow and water much better than hiking boots. The tread is not deep which makes it easier to remove mud etc from them as opposed to the very aggressive tread pattern of hiking boots. Another reason I picked this boot is the color and design. Should I feel the need to wear them to work on a cold, snowy, or in the very wet which we will experience soon with the snow melt, the boots are good looking and could almost pass as a dress shoe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great: Comfort, Style and Price
reviews.reviewText: Great comfort, style & price...what's not to like...wore them with cuffed jeans and a vest/shirt. Comfortable enough to wear all day for me and I'm usually a Sketcher "comfort" shoe wearer. Not sure I'd wanna go hiking in them but their sturdy enough to if you want. The other cool thing about these is not only do they have the standard boot type laces but they have a zipper on the side which actually makes them slip ons if you're not up to lacing that morning...if I had my choice, the only thing I'd do different is to make the laces shorter, I'm not a fan of long dangling laces.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Definitely great shoes and great comfort. They look professional for work and fit as useful as boots

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great casual boots
reviews.reviewText: These are great casual boots. They're not real motorcycle boots. I used them for the MSF and they worked as well as any other street footwear I could've bought, but obviously don't have extra protection features and are easily scratched and scuffed.The plus is that they look great out of the box, are very comfortable in cool weather, and haven't fallen apart in the week I've been wearing them. Love the side zips too, they're actually functional and have a flap to keep them from rubbing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and look nice
reviews.reviewText: I am picky with shoes, so I wasn’t expecting to like these too much. These seem well made and comfortable. I added some athletic insoles and I can wear these all day while walking and sitting and going up and down stairs. I don’t think they are totally water proof, but no problems with a little rain.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Boots for the Price!
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for my Motorcycle endorsement class and have been very happy with the purchase. It's been two months since I bought them and I've now ridden 500 miles wearing these boots, and they are still holding up great/almost new. Very comfortable and the side zipper is super convenient, I think these boots are awesome!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Vostey Men’s Hiking Boots - A Hike Through Mixed Impressions
reviews.reviewText: When I first laid eyes on the Vostey Men’s Hiking Boots, I was immediately captivated by their rugged aesthetic. The robust design, emphasized by the waterproof feature and the unique pattern on the sole, looked like it promised an adventure. But as we all know, appearances can be deceptive.To give you a more comprehensive view, my relationship with these boots is complicated. For someone who’s an avid hiker, my expectations for performance, comfort, and durability are set fairly high. While the boots performed reasonably well in some aspects, they did leave room for improvement in others, making them a mixed bag.🥾 Aesthetic Appeal: Looks to Impress but Not to LastThe Vostey hiking boots are undoubtedly stylish. The first time you put them on, you’ll feel ready to conquer not just mountains but even casual social outings. However, the aesthetic quality comes with a caveat: durability. After a few hikes, the material started to show signs of wear, and the color began to fade slightly. For boots designed for the rough terrains, this is somewhat disappointing.🌧️ Waterproofing: More Like Water-ResistantOne of the main features that drew me to these boots was the promise of waterproofing. While they did keep my feet dry in light rain, they were not able to hold up under more severe wet conditions. They are more water-resistant than waterproof, so don’t expect them to be your savior in a downpour or during a stream crossing.👟 Comfort and Fit: A Tale of Two StoriesThe initial fitting was snug and comfortable; however, that comfort started to wane on longer hikes. They’re fine for short walks or even a half-day of moderate hiking, but anything beyond that and you’ll start to notice some discomfort in the arch and heel areas.🛠️ Construction and Material: Robust Yet Not InvincibleThese boots appear to be built like a tank. The soles are made of durable material designed to grip rocky terrains, and the overall construction feels sturdy. But as mentioned before, the upper part of the boots didn’t withstand the test of time and adventures as well as I had hoped.💰 Pricing: Middle of the RoadConsidering the mixed performance, the price point is justifiable but not a steal. There are definitely better options available if you’re willing to invest a bit more for top-tier hiking boots. However, if you’re on a budget and looking for something to get you through less demanding terrains, these boots can be a consideration.🤔 Final Thoughts and SummaryIn conclusion, the Vostey Men’s Hiking Boots are a mixed bag. They do offer a level of style, basic waterproofing, and initial comfort. However, they lack in areas of long-term durability and sustained comfort on more challenging terrains. These boots are not your go-to for intensive hiking expeditions but could serve you well for short hikes and casual wear. My experience was neither overwhelmingly positive nor entirely negative, landing these boots a solid 3-star rating.If you’re a casual hiker looking for a reasonably priced pair of boots that can also serve as stylish daily wear, these might be worth a try. But if you’re planning on rigorous hiking adventures, you might want to look elsewhere. Thank you for reading, and I hope this review aids you in your decision-making process.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Hard to find size, super handsome and comfortable. Decent quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Really good. With some flaws.
reviews.reviewText: My husband loves these! Hes extremely picky with his shoes so we were nervous when we got them. However he says they’re the most comfortable shoes he’s ever worn. The only thing is that if they are your everyday shoes they’re not going to last long
Love the look of it and style!!!
Very comfortable, fit true to size, size 10 fits like a size 10. Update: So comfortable I bought a brown pair and ordering a black pair as well.
I really like these boots, however it seems to run a bit big. If I had ordered a half size shorter, they would've fit perfect. I still wear them though.

reviews.reviewTitle: Look great , feel great... Not much grip
reviews.reviewText: Love the feel of them they fit amazingly, but the grip is not the greatest

reviews.reviewTitle: Comfortable but paint started coming off boot
reviews.reviewText: The paint started coming off on both of the boots after three weeks. I work from home so they do not get used every day orbit for long periods.The boots are comfortable and warm but would stay away from buying.
